001.name: Commander
001.text: What is this? The report? Let me see.

006.name: Commander
006.text: Based on the data acquired, the lost expedition have been abducted by an alien life form.

007.name: Commander
007.text: Good thing that we have a lead on where to find them.

008.name: Commander
008.text: The chief engineer installed a tracker on their suits in case someone gets the SOS.

009.name: Commander
009.text: We have to help them. One way or another.

010.name: CrewOne
010.text: But sir, we may be underpowered.

011.name: Commander
011.text: Then we should make preparations for any circumstance.

013.name: CrewOne
013.text: Sir, it may be wise for us to land on the nearby planet. We may be able to get resources.

014.name: CrewOne
014.text: Scans suggests that it is a lush planet with a lot of minerals.
